install.name: Latest group walls
install.author: JomSocial Team
install.description: Show recent wall posts from groups

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of wall posts to display (default is 5)

param.name: charcount
param.label: Comment character count
param.description: The number of characters to be displayed for the comments

param.name: show_avatar
param.label: Show group avatar
param.description: Select whether to show the avatar of the group
